page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF TRACY 1
page.content:
THURSDAY 12TH JULY 1985 I got up at 7.30am,dressed and went downstairs to have cornflakes for breakfast.At 8.45 I left for school, arrived at 8.55 and went in at 9.00. First we had assembly followed by P.E. in the hall then we had playtime at 10.40.I played skipping with Gaynor, Lisa and Penny untill 11.00 then we came in and did language work.Next we did singing and at 12.15 we played out for 15 mins. until 12.30 when we came in for our dinner.My favourite school dinner is chips,peas and fish fingers. When I had finished my dinner at about 1.00,I went outside to play in the playground.Me and my friends played rounders with children from Junior 3 until 1.30.
(continued on next page)
